content: Investments Asked by HeYuan ChenAsked on 13 Oct 2018Does anyone purchase ETF in LSE using Standard Chartered platform? Is the dual currencies ETF similar to local context where the units are amalgamate? Or does it show 2 different counters on the platform?1 answerAnswerBump1

Gabriel Tham, Kenichi Tag Team Member at Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 15 Oct 2018It will show as 2 different ticker symbol on the brokerage but is actually the same ETF just different traded currency.For example VWRL and VWRD are actually the same ETF, just that when u buy u pay in different currency for each0 comments0
